description: Erection of first floor side extension.
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the end of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

Condition : 2 - All new external work shall be carried out in materials that resemble, as closely as possible, in colour and texture those of the existing building, unless otherwise specified in the approved application. 

Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area in accordance with the requirements of policy D1 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017. 
Condition : 3 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans 201-01 and 101-01.


Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
Condition : 4 - The flat roof of the extension hereby approved shall not be used as an outdoor amenity space or terrace.

Reason: In order to prevent unreasonable overlooking and to safeguard the residential amenity of neighbouring occupiers in accordance with Policy A1 (Managing the impact of development) of the Camden Local Plan 2017.
Condition : 5 - Obscure glass window

The new double glazed sash window on the side elevation hereby approved shall be obscure glazed, as shown on drawing numbers 101-01 and 201-01 and permanently maintained as such.

Reason: To prevent unreasonable overlooking to neighbouring properties in accordance with Policy A1 (Managing the the impact of development) of the Camden Local Plan 2017.
